title: Extreme poverty to fall below 10 percent, moving world closer to reaching UN goal by ...
text: ( Source : UN - United Nations ) 5 October 2015 - The World Bank announced today that extreme poverty is likely to fall to below 10 per cent this year, 'giving fresh evidence that a quarter-century-long sustained reduction in poverty is moving
